00006 string YardTaxType::ToString(const string& delim, bool quote) const {
00007     
00008     stringstream output;
00009     char q = '\'';
00010     output 
00011         << GetId() << delim
00012         << q << GetName() << q << delim 
00013         << GetPercentS();
00014     
00015     return output.str();    
00016 }
